ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( OR(ISPICKVAL(Type__c, "New Business"), ISPICKVAL(Type__c, "Expansion"), ISPICKVAL(Type__c, "Cross-sell (New product)")), OR(ISPICKVAL(Sub_Type__c, "ASO Opt-In"), ISPICKVAL(Sub_Type__c, "ASO Opt-Out"), ISPICKVAL(Sub_Type__c, "TPA/Reseller"), ISPICKVAL(Sub_Type__c, "Other")), IsBlank(Parent_Opportunity__c))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Parent Opportunity field required when Opportunity Type equals New Business, Expansion and Subtype equals ASO Opt-In, ASO Opt-Out, TPA/Reseller, Other
